Sentencas: A general procedure based on the oxalate coprecipitation route was developed to produce very sinterable ceria (CeO2) powder doped with Gd2O3, Sm2O3 or Y2O3.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The method is simple, reliable and very reproducible.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Without any milling step, powder of 20 mol% GdO1.5, SmO1.5 or YO1.5-CeO2 could be fired translucent dense (97% relative to theoretical) at 1300 degrees C (4 h) already, as pressed compacts.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: This compares to typical values of 95% relative density obtained after firing at 1500-1600 degrees C in the standard literature.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Cast tapes from the intensively milled powders were fired equally dense at 1400 degrees C (2 h), among the best results yet reported for tape cast doped ceria.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Owing to their high density, excellent ionic conductivity values were observed for the doped ceria electrolytes, on the order of 5-7 S m(-1) at 750 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Low temperature fabrication of (Y,Gd,Sm)-doped ceria electrolyte
